#summary Instructions on how to build Piriti.

= Build Instructions =

Piriti is build using maven. To compile and install call
{{{
mvn clean install
}}}

If you working with eclipse you can generate the necessary project files by calling 
{{{
mvn eclipse:eclipse
}}} 
The generated project has the relevant GWT natures and is recognized by the Goole Eclipse plug-in.

= Selenium Tests = 
The pom contains the profile {{{firefox}}}. When using this profile like this
{{{
mvn integration-test -P firefox
}}}
Maven will start a selenium server and run some GWT test cases against a firefox browser. Please note that you will need a firefox instalation on your machine.
